name: Sweet Shop Tower - Match 3 Jello
description:
Have fun matching candies and exploring the world of candy sweets with cute animals! Yum!

Players will find delight in this sweet match 3 puzzle game. Just try to match 3 or more candies in a row!

Sweet Shop Tower features:
● Sugary sweet candy treats that will leave you hungry for more!
● Discover yummy environments and meet the sweetest characters like jelly fish, star fish, gummy bears, turtles, puppies and kittens!
● Unlock adventurous levels and discover special treats for dessert!
● Helpful magical powerups and boosters to beat tough levels (e.g. mint and count down bombs)
● Easy and fun to play, challenging to master. Build up a fruit splash mania!
● Hundreds of sugar sweet levels in the Sweet Shop Tower - more being added every month!
● Play alongside friends and competitors on social networks!

Tips and tricks:
- Try to set up chain reactions to enjoy higher scores as a ballet of sweets tumble and fall from the board!
- On mint levels, remove them as fast as possible before it spreads!
- Remember to keep an eye on count down bombs!
- Keep making appointments to play to earn free spins of the bonus prize wheel!
- Try out different avatars for your choice of pet style (tap on your avatar) - there are more than 30 cute n cuddly animals to choose from!
- Mix and match your super candies! How about a chocolate smoothie?

DOWNLOAD AND MATCH TODAY!
